Description:
Deanhouse Interiors Ltd PN served re risk of falling

PN/2022/3/23/SLI
312384888

Persons are liable to fall from unprotected floor edges
because you have not taken suitable + sufficient steps (eg by the provision of guard rails top boards/barriers) to prevent persons falling a distance - liable to cause personal injury. This being a matter within your control. The only work permitted on the mezzanine floor is work to rectify the situation.
